about.me: Welcome to Latin Stake Pool's first Cardano stake pool Chichen Itza. Latin Stake Pools in an Argentine start-up which aims to provide the people of Latin America with access to crypto passive income as well as quality educational content via the youtube channel.
about.server: Four nodes, one block producer and three relays. Hosted in four different VPS with three different providers and in three different geographical locations for the best redundancy and uptime.
